full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 40 of 236 LC3Cmax1 Alessi - cross 1 MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can show the witness, please, 3504-022. On this particular document, it's page 14. We're going to be looking at deposition transcript pages 133 through 135. THE WITNESS: I cannot read this page. MR. PAGLIUCA: It will come up for you on the screen, Mr. Alessi. THE WITNESS: Is that my screen, because -- THE COURT: They'll make it bigger, Mr. Alessi. MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can go in this document, which is going to be page 14 of the document, and the page number I'd like to start with, the deposition page number is 133. If we can blow that up for the witness, please. BY MR. PAGLIUCA: Q. At line 12, Mr. Alessi, do you recall giving the following testimony -- THE COURT: I can't hear you. MR. PAGLIUCA: I'm sorry, your Honor. Q. Do you recall giving the following testimony, Mr. Alessi: "A. That incident is, I went to the house and I got some money. "Q. What time of day did you go to the house? "A. Night. "Q. Was anybody home? "A. No. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012554
